data.headline: Experienced Product Manager with Expertise in Enterprise Architecture
data.summary: Seasoned Product Manager with a strong background in enterprise architecture, driving innovative solutions and optimizing complex systems.
data.narrative: Maximilian Müller is an experienced Product Manager with a deep understanding of enterprise architecture. Throughout his career, he has demonstrated a talent for leading cross-functional teams, identifying and addressing complex challenges, and delivering impactful solutions that drive business growth. Maximilian's expertise in enterprise architecture has been instrumental in his ability to conceptualize and implement innovative products that streamline operations, enhance user experiences, and unlock new revenue streams. With a keen eye for detail and a strategic mindset, he has consistently exceeded stakeholder expectations and contributed to the success of the organizations he has served.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Spearheaded the development and implementation of a enterprise-wide business intelligence platform, resulting in a 25% increase in data-driven decision-making.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and launch a new customer self-service portal, improving customer satisfaction by 18%.
Utilized enterprise architecture principles to optimize the company's software ecosystem, streamlining operations and reducing IT infrastructure costs by 12%.

experience.title: Product Manager
bullets: Drove the development and launch of a cutting-edge enterprise resource planning (ERP) system, integrating multiple legacy systems and improving operational efficiency by 15%.
Collaborated with the enterprise architecture team to design and implement a scalable microservices-based architecture, enhancing the company's agility and adaptability.
Spearheaded the migration of the company's e-commerce platform to a cloud-based infrastructure, resulting in a 20% reduction in hosting costs and improved system reliability.

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
bullets: Contributed to the development and launch of a new product line, leading to a 12% increase in market share within the first year.
Participated in the enterprise architecture planning process, providing insights that helped optimize the company's technology stack and improve system integration.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Friendly, confident, and approachable expression.
